/usr/bin/c++     CMakeFiles/torero_thread_example.dir/main.cpp.o  -o torero_thread_example libs/libtorero_threads.a /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libboost_chrono.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libboost_system.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libboost_thread.so -lpthread /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libboost_date_time.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libboost_atomic.so
